name: Derpy the Spider
description:
Play as Derpy the Spider in this 2D Puzzle Platformer.

Derpy has never been the most clever spider in the web. He has always been made fun of by because he only walks on 2 legs. Luckily for him, he can rip off the extra ones and use them as a resource whenever he likes!

Collect Derpy's kids and head to his web in order to escape his psychotic wife.

A Student Project from Vancouver Film School's Game Design Program.
